description: This Kotlin source file defines the MainActivity class for the Expense Tracker app. It sets up the activity's UI, binds views, initializes a ViewModel, and observes several state flows to log state changes for debugging purposes.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is a minimal Android activity that initializes the user interface, connects to a ViewModel, and logs state changes to demonstrate StateFlow operation. It serves as the entry point for the application.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when activity is created. Sets up UI, initializes ViewModel, and starts observing ViewModel state flows.

methods.name: observeViewModel
methods.description: Sets up collectors for ViewModel StateFlow properties to log updates.
